00018 /*
00019  *
00020  *
00021  */
00022 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00023 {
00024     struct Device *hd;
00025     struct Volume *vol;
00026     struct File *fic;
00027     unsigned char buf[1];
00028     struct List *list, *cell;
00029     struct GenBlock *block;
00030     BOOL true = TRUE;
00031  
00032     adfEnvInitDefault();
00033 
00034     adfChgEnvProp(PR_USEDIRC,&true);
00035  
00036     /* create and mount one device */
00037     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev", 80, 2, 11);
00038     if (!hd) {
00039         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00040         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00041     }
00042 
00043     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00044 
00045     if (adfCreateFlop( hd, "empty", FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE )!=RC_OK) {
00046         fprintf(stderr, "can't create floppy\n");
00047         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00048         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00049     }
00050 
00051     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00052     if (!vol) {
00053         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00054         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00055         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00056     }
00057 
00058     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "file_1a","w");
00059     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00060     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00061     adfCloseFile(fic);
00062 
00063     puts("\ncreate file_1a");
00064     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00065 
00066     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00067     puts("\ncreate dir_5u");
00068     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00069 
00070     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00071     while(cell) {
00072         printEntry(cell->content);
00073         cell = cell->next;
00074     }
00075     adfFreeDirList(list);
00076 
00077     puts("\nremove file_1a");
00078     adfRemoveEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"file_1a");
00079     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00080 
00081     adfRemoveEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00082     puts("\nremove dir_5u");
00083     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00084 
00085     cell = list = adfGetDelEnt(vol);
00086     while(cell) {
00087         block =(struct GenBlock*) cell->content;
00088        printf("%s %d %d %ld\n",block->name,block->type,block->secType,
00089             block->sect);
00090         cell = cell->next;
00091     }
00092     adfFreeDelList(list);
00093 
00094     adfUndelEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,883); // file_1a
00095     puts("\nundel file_1a");
00096     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00097 
00098     adfUndelEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,885); // dir_5u
00099     puts("\nundel dir_5u");
00100     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00101 
00102     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00103     while(cell) {
00104         printEntry(cell->content);
00105         cell = cell->next;
00106     }
00107     adfFreeDirList(list);
00108 
00109 
00110     adfUnMount(vol);
00111     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00112 
00113     adfEnvCleanUp();
00114 
00115     return 0;
00116 }
